nocodb 0.0.9000

Update NocoDB table column

Source: R/nocodb.gen.R
update_tbl_col.Rd

Updates the metadata of the specified table column on a NocoDB server via its PATCH /api/v2/meta/columns/{id_col} API endpoint.

Usage

update_tbl_col(
  id_col,
  body_json,
  auto_unbox = TRUE,
  hostname = pal::pkg_config_val(key = "hostname", pkg = this_pkg),
  email = pal::pkg_config_val(key = "email", pkg = this_pkg, required = FALSE),
  password = pal::pkg_config_val(key = "password", pkg = this_pkg, required = FALSE),
  api_token = pal::pkg_config_val(key = "api_token", pkg = this_pkg, required = FALSE)
)

Arguments

id_col

NocoDB column identifier as returned by tbl_col_id(). A character scalar.

body_json

Data to include as JSON in the HTTP request body. Either a list or NULL for an empty body.

auto_unbox

Whether or not to automatically "unbox" length-1 vectors in body_json to JSON scalars.

hostname

NocoDB server hostname. A character scalar.

email

E-mail address of the NocoDB user to authenticate with.

password

Password of the NocoDB user to authenticate with.

api_token

NocoDB API token. Takes precedence over email and password if provided.

Value

TODO

See also

Other functions to manage NocoDB table columns: set_display_val(), set_display_vals(), tbl_col(), tbl_col_id(), tbl_cols()
